name: Crypto Pets
description:
Trade millions of virtual pets in the open market.
Currently there are over 1 Billion combinations of unique one of a kind pets possible.
Sell your pet to the open market, and breed your pet with others to make more valuable species.

View your pets parents, and their parents!

This is the First release, and I will be adding more features to improve and add to the market place.

Make a suggestion on what you would like to see!

Want to support the Development?
Buy More Purrency!
Buy the developer a drink!
Buy the developer a sandwich!
Buy the developer some clothes!
I could really use the money!

Please leave a comment or email the Dev. with what you would like to see come to the app, or post bugs that you have found.

Planned For the Future:
      -Name your pet, and no one can change them, even after they belong to someone else.
      -Whatever Gets Suggested to me; First Come, First Serve

Or do nothing, its not you owe me anything.

"Something something,       break all your pots."
            -The Dev. LikeTheStreet
